Name: Ecchi Spirit
About the game: Takeshi is a famous exorcist. He had heard about horrible forest spirits attacking people in a small village. Upon arrival, he found out that those spirits are only interested in young maidens and are not really trying to hurt anyone. They want something else... Use your exorcism skills to find spirits and chase them away. Unfortunately, it is not an easy task because those perverted spirits love to stick to a girlâ€™s body, sometimes in the most lovely places. Ecchi Spirit is a point-and-click arcade game focused on erotic experience. The game is fully 3D, and you can rotate the camera as you like. Play more to unlock new girls, new exorcism rites, and special events. Beautiful girls, each with her personality and story. Talk to them or strip them naked! Various exorcism rites with multiple types of nasty spirits. Intriguing story in the form of a visual novel. The Combo system rewards you for playing smart. You can play with only one hand...
